message: I'm being generous, but I want the majority of the money since I'm the one who has to deal with inflation.
I'll take a smaller share now, but I'll make up for it later
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to compensate for the inflation. Let's work together to find a solution.
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give in completely yet
I'm getting squeezed by this inflation, but I'm still trying to be fair.  Let's split it closer to 60/40 this time.  If you reject this, we're getting dangerously close to getting nothing!
I'm not willing to give up more than 40%
